course_title: TechTool: Using Generative AI for Text & Images
course_description: Generative is AI poised to disrupt the economy. While many are concerned about it replacing workers, research has shown that it can increase both employee productivity and job satisfaction. This course will introduce you to generative AI tools for text (ChatGPT) and images (Stable Diffusion). Viewing these technologies in a collaborative light, we will work through a series of applications so that you can gain hands-on experience in interacting with these tools so that you can incorporate them into your professional and personal activities.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5540, Section #: 1101, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: D. Schweidel, Status: Closed
